# ðŸ—ƒï¸ [FiorenMas ReVanced Builds](https://github.com/FiorenMas/Revanced-And-Revanced-Extended-Non-Root)
**Real-time repository that builds APKs with Revanced, Revanced Extended, and many more patches about 10 minutes after their release.**
> [!NOTE] 
> Beta versions mean using dev patches, not using beta apk files. Beta version have the same package name as Stable version, so installing them will overwrite Stable version.

## ðŸ“¥ How to Install via [Obtainium](https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium)
Obtainium is the easiest way to install and update FiorenMas ReVanced APKs.

1. Open the **Obtainium** app.  
2. Tap **Add app**.  
3. In the **App source URL** box, enter one of the following

```  
https://github.com/FiorenMas/Revanced-And-Revanced-Extended-Non-Root
```

6. Scroll down to **Filter APKs by regular expression**.  
7. Enter the appropriate regex from the table below for the app you want.  
8. Tap **Add** to begin downloading.

## ðŸ”Ž Regex Patterns for Filtering APKs

<details>
<summary><strong><b>ðŸ¦˜ Jump Table</b></strong></summary>

  <br>
  
| Column 1 | Column 2 | Column 3 |
|----------|----------|----------|
| [YouTube](#youtube) | [YouTube Music](#youtube-music) | [Facebook](#facebook) |
| [Twitter X](#twitter-x) | [Instagram](#instagram) | [Threads](#threads) |
| [Google Photos](#google-photos) | [Messenger](#messenger) | [Spotify](#spotify) |
| [Telegram](#telegram) | [TikTok](#tiktok) | [Twitch](#twitch) |
| [Reddit](#reddit) | [Lightroom](#lightroom) | [Tumblr](#tumblr) |
| [SoundCloud](#soundcloud) | [Duolingo](#duolingo) | [Google News](#google-news) |
| [Photomath](#photomath) | [Proton Mail](#proton-mail) | [RAR](#rar) |
| [Strava](#strava) | [Pixiv](#pixiv) | [Bilibili Chinese](#bilibili-chinese) |
| [Prime Video](#prime-video) | [Viber](#viber) | [Crunchyroll](#crunchyroll) |
| [Solid Explorer](#solid-explorer) | [Nova Launcher](#nova-launcher) | [Tasker](#tasker) |
| [FX File Explorer](#fx-file-explorer) |  |  |

</details>
